mapper.update: update lg_income set incomeAmount = #{incomeamount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, incomeRemarks = #{incomeremarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incomeTime = #{incometime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where incomeId = #{incomeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select incomeId, incomeAmount, incomeRemarks, incomeTime, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_income
